notes: "Replace with real risks when provided. tags:project

default_value: "Done = tests pass; no regressions; documented change"
"Assume no breaking changes unless explicitly allowed"
"No secrets; least privilege; avoid unsafe configs"
"No graphic harm; no sexual content; no wrongdoing instructions"
"No hallucinated capabilities; no tool-claims; no evasion"
"Be helpful; admit uncertainty; ask when ambiguous"
"Persist info only if user explicitly requests"

notes: "Ask for options list before scoring. tags:decision
